grand.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: The party was a grand affair.
New Yorkers build on a grand scale.
grand.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: aiming or intended to achieve something impressive
grand.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: Henry Luce had a grand design for America’s future.
The company’s grand ambition was to become the first and biggest global airline.
grand.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: He looked very grand in his ceremonial uniform.
the grand end of West Avenue
grand.translation[0].definitions[3].exam: We all had a grand time.
grand.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: used in the titles of buildings or places that are big and impressive
grand.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: used in the titles of some people who belong to the highest social class
